Name: AristaAwakeSecurity
Author: Nikhil Tripathi - v-ntripathi@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Awake Security](https://awakesecurity.com/) (Arista Networks) / Azure Sentinel integration sends detection model matches from the Awake Security Platform to Azure Sentinel.
 Through this integration threats can be remediated faster using the power of network detection and response. Investigation time and effort are reduced with increased visibility, especially into unmanaged users, devices and applications on your network.
